Title: Prohibits the incineration of perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances as a means of disposal
Summary: Prohibits the incineration of perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances as a means of disposal.
LawCode: Amd ยง37-0101, add ยง37-0121, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the incineration of perfluoroalkyl and polyfluoroalkyl substances as a means of disposal
